  • Method Details

    • isValidMovement

      public boolean isValidMovement​(int playerID, java.lang.String direction)
      Checks if the player's movement in Direction is valid. Does not check if the player leaves the area or not. This should be handled by either changing return type to int or include a chunk id in this Class
      Parameters:
      playerID - player who would move
      direction - the direction of movement
      Returns:
      if the player can move or not

    • getNewCoor

      public int[] getNewCoor​(int playerID, java.lang.String direction)
      get the coordinate if the player move to one case in the direction
      Parameters:
      playerID - player moving
      direction - direction of movement
      Returns:
      new coordinate

    • isValidTalk

      public int[] isValidTalk​(int playerID, java.lang.String direction)
      Checks if there's a player in an adjacent tile in Direction of the player return the coordinate of that adjacent player, or -1 -1 if there isn't one
      Parameters:
      playerID - player who would talk
      direction - the direction talk
      Returns:
      coordinate of the player to talk or (-1;-1) if player can't talk

    • moveTo

      public int[] moveTo​(int id, java.lang.String direction)
      compute the new coordinate of the player who move at one direction need to call isValidMovement before to check if the movement is valid
      Parameters:
      id - player who would move
      direction - the direction of movement
      Returns:
      new coordinate

    • loadRdmSeed

      public java.lang.String loadRdmSeed()
      load a random seed to add obstacle in the chunk
      Returns:
      seed name

    • findFreeCase

      public int[] findFreeCase()
      get coordonate of free case in the chunk
      Returns:
      coordonate of free case or (-1;-1) if all case are full

    • findIdCase
